MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the TD11 postcode area of Duns. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 1.00pm to make repairs to overhead line equipment near to Nisbet Hill farm and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3.00pm. We will update this message if this information changes We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11.45am on 29th October 2020.
